404650.name: Poppy Kart - Soundtrack
404650.description:
The 14 audio tracks from Poppy Kart (mp3 192kbits/s).

This music is written by Franck Graziano ( Poppy Street band: ) and uses the General Midi soundbank to produce a retro sound.

All songs have been written with Guitar pro 5. Some FX or songs come from Poppy Street songs.

Tracklist :

1. Start song
2. Story
3. Poppy
4. Crapo
5. Lava
6. Bonus
7. Space
8. Island
9. Labyrinthe
10. Pyramid
11. Bigoudi
12. The Matrix
13. Waterlily Party
14. The End
404650.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西
*具有完全音频支持的语言
